sentences.en: Do you think she could be prevailed upon to do those things?
sentences.cn: 你觉得有可能说服她去做那些事情吗？

sentences.en: He could imitate in speech or writing most of those he admired.
sentences.cn: 他能模仿大多数自己崇拜的偶像的讲话和写作风格。

sentences.en: He dotted down those notes.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆记下了那些注解。

sentences.en: He stared at me out of those washed-out blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 他用暗淡无神的蓝眼睛盯着我看。

sentences.en: I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 我非常同情生活在那些地方的人们。

sentences.en: I like these and he likes those.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这些，他喜欢那些。

sentences.en: I like these but she likes those.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这些，而她喜欢那些。

sentences.en: I transplanted those flowers to the garden.
sentences.cn: 我把那些花移植到花园里。

sentences.en: In those days you did what you were told.
sentences.cn: 那时候，你只能听命于人。

sentences.en: Our tour prices bore little resemblance to those in the holiday brochures.
sentences.cn: 我们的旅游报价和那些度假手册里的价格相去甚远。

sentences.en: She ganged up on me with those rough boys.
sentences.cn: 她伙同那些粗野的男孩对付我。

sentences.en: The City's reputation has been sullied by scandals like those at Lloyd's.
sentences.cn: 类似劳埃德保险公司的那些丑闻令伦敦名声扫地。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: The weather was unkind to those pipers who played in the morning.
sentences.cn: 坏天气对上午那些风笛吹奏者毫不容情。

sentences.en: There are those, you know, who, by circumstance, end up homeless.
sentences.cn: 您知道，会有那么一些人，因为命运捉弄而落得无家可归。

sentences.en: They're trying their best to bring together those separated families.
sentences.cn: 他们正尽最大的努力让离散的家人重聚。

sentences.en: Those killed have been described as the flower of Polish manhood.
sentences.cn: 那些牺牲者被称为波兰男子中的精英。

sentences.en: Those people who took up weapons to defend themselves are political prisoners.
sentences.cn: 那些拿起武器自卫的人是些政治犯。

sentences.en: Those tensions have been felt most acutely by women.
sentences.cn: 最能深切感受到这种紧张氛围的是女性。

sentences.en: Those who suffer from narcissism become self-absorbed or chronic show-offs.
sentences.cn: 被自恋症折磨的人会变得只专注于自己的事情，或者不断地自我炫耀。

sentences.en: Witnesses said that two people were killed, but those accounts could not be confirmed.
sentences.cn: 目击者说两人遇害，但那些说法都没法得到证实。

trans.tran_cn: 那，那个( that的名词复数)，（指较远的人或事物）那，（指已提到过或已知的人或事物）那，（特指）那

trans.tran_en: You use those to refer to people or things which have already been mentioned
refer to people or things which have already been mentioned
